name: Square Glasses
description: Using advanced edging technology and high-quality materials, our premium sunglasses have a luxurious feel with subtly curved lenses. Made with lightweight TR90 plastic, these large square sunglasses have a striking layered design. The matte translucent front rim features a dark tortoiseshell overlay and dark tortoiseshell temple arms. A metal brow bar adds a modern touch. Please note, the actual pattern on eyeglasses may vary slightly from the one pictured.
